ai-mil7.3.1:1.1_0: “Venerable sir, what definitely did you say?”
ai-mil7.3.1:1.2_0: “Great king, if the grass stones threw down a creeper or a strip, and he cuts it down with a stick or a stone.
ai-mil7.3.1:1.3_0: In the same way, when a meditator is engaged in by those who enjoy perfection, he should spend the objects of his heart on the basis of Arahantship.
ai-mil7.3.1:1.4_0: This is the practice of staying in a single vicinity.
ai-mil7.3.1:1.5_0: The senior monk who has heard the statement of the Teacher:
ai-mil7.3.1:3.1_0: So too, the Buddha was instructed
ai-mil7.3.1:3.3_0: having grabbed the object of the kings,
ai-mil7.3.1:3.4_0: should be grown in the fruit of the trainees.’”
ai-mil7.3.1:4.1_0: The first enquiry belonging to the whole world.
